extendedInfo.description: The keeping of a headache diary / migraine diary is a recommended practice to help detail the characteristics of personal headaches, including triggers and remedies. The headache diary is a tool that can help you tracking your headaches and generate detailed reports for your health care provider.** The number 1 selling headache diary on the Android Market **What people are saying..."Great app & very responsive developer has everything my dr needs""Awesome app for migraine patients""Great Great app only one I ever bought"The headache diary can help you tracking your migraines and headaches.  Using the generated reports the Headache Diary can help you gain a better understanding of your migraine / headache that ultimately aims to help improve you lifestyle.+++ Features and Functions:* Color theme optimized for ease of reading for migraine sufferers* Add details entries tracking the following: - Headache start Date & Time - The duration of a headache - The type of headache (Migraine, Tension, etc) - Location of pain (Left Side, Forehead etc) with customize option - The severity of an headache - Triggers (Allergies, Exercise, etc) - Fully customizable Trigger entries  - Multiple trigger selection - Affects of a headache (Unable to work, Nausea, etc) - Medication taken, the amount and the effect - Medication list fully customizable - Notes * Reporting Features with charts - Historical list of headaches, with severity - Summary of headaches  - Types of headaches - Headache Location - Report headache occurrence by day of week - Report headache occurrence by time of day - Triggers - Severity of pain over time* Generate and email PDF reports of your headache data and charts.* Charts of filterable by date for further analysis. Helps you gain a better understanding of your headaches.* Exporting of the data as CSV for use in Excel* Backup and Restore + automatic backup option to keep your data safe* German, French, Italian, Spanish, English Language supported in the App.* Cloud BackupCloud backup stores your data in the google cloud.  This service will restore your data on re-installation of the app on your current phone or alternative device, when using the same account.  Requires Android 2.2+.  To enable cloud backup & restore please check the Settings --> Privacy options on your phone.+++ supportIf you miss a feature or have problems, please contact us and we do our best to help.  service@froggyware.com+++ import from lite versionYou can import your saved data from the lite version.  First export the data from the Lite version and use the import function in the Pro version to re-import you data.

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Helps to keep track of migraines and my doctor like the PDF report.
reviews.author: Kevin St-Laurent

reviews.title: Great App!!!!
reviews.comment: My doctor wants me to log my headaches and migraines and this app has everything I need to be able to get the info he wants. It\'s fast and easy to use.
reviews.author: Erin Boyd

reviews.title: Can\'t live without it
reviews.comment: I purchased this app instantly because I could tell instantly tell how much more useful this would be than just marking my calendar with a star. It\'s helped me and my doctors.
reviews.author: Alana Zemaitaitis

reviews.title: Wish I had this years ago!
reviews.comment: Suffering from disabling migraines it\'s always so hard to try to keep diaries, charts, etc.  this is so great to take our send to the Dr! Modifiable is even better!
reviews.author: Vanessa Hand

reviews.comment: Great headache diary! Simple to use and easy to print out in pdf.
reviews.author: Jennipher Broyles

reviews.title: Good but needs improvement
reviews.comment: Needs some work particularly with respect to user configurable settings.
reviews.author: Ralph Pantuso

reviews.title: Would like to edit
reviews.comment: 5 stars to be able to edit entries. If I enter it when I first get the headache the start time is accurate but then I can\'t enter actual duration or additional meds taken. If I wait until the headache is over, I have to write all the info down somewhere THEN create the entry which defeats the purpose of having a electronic way of storing records.
reviews.author: Renee Ricks

reviews.title: Headache Pro
reviews.comment: I love this app. It is a quick, thorough way to track my headaches. Only thing I would like to do is edit entry if I news to change something or add a Med.
reviews.author: Diane Willingham

reviews.title: Simple but confusing UI
reviews.comment: Best app I have found, it works. To edit, click on list, then on individual headache. Took a bit too figure that out. Customizable triggers and medications as well as a place for notes. Charts to show length, severity of the headache, location and more.
reviews.author: Tina Cruz

reviews.title: Easy to use and navigate
reviews.comment: Quick entry.  Nice graphs.  Duration of headaches has too wide a range (several days). Im still searching for a graph that shows specific time of day. I highly recommend this app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very useful!
reviews.comment: Easy to use app that allows me to track my headaches which I\'ve never done before. Well worth the money for me.
reviews.author: Laura Kane

reviews.title: Huge help!!
reviews.comment: App has helped me track my migraines and keep an eye on what meds are helping overall.
reviews.author: Derek Brown

reviews.comment: Great App. Could use a customizeable field for symptoms with headache.  Yet excellent for keeping empirical data when headaches are severe.  Helped me change eating, drinking, & Med. habits to prevent and shorten migraines.
reviews.author: Debi Marie

reviews.title: Helpful
reviews.comment: This is a great app.  It has allowed me to keep track of my headaches better then other apps.
reviews.author: Kathrine Yamamoto

reviews.title: Great migraine app
reviews.comment: You can track your headaches, triggers, duration, medication etc. Medication and triggers can be customized. Nice charts. Very good app, font size is a little small for the charts though.
reviews.author: Bj\303\266rn Maier

reviews.title: Great headache tracker
reviews.comment: Really happy with tracker! Started with free version and ungraded to paid because I thought it was so useful!
reviews.author: Andrea Cote

reviews.title: Get App. Really helps my doctor.
reviews.comment: This app is great for people who have frequent headaches of all kinds. This application helps my doctor know exactly how I\'ve been doing without having to try to memorize everything. PDF aspect needs a little improvement. Needs to be cleaned up, organized better and display am & pm for times.
reviews.author: Ashley Marston

reviews.title: Pretty Good . .
reviews.comment: . . but a bit annoying that the max headache length is 24 hours . . . plenty of mine are measured in days rather than hours.  Also would be nice to view headaches on a day by day calender to look for monthly patterns (i.e. to see if related to menstrual phase)
reviews.author: Victoria Anderson

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: I like this app. Started to use when my migraines became daily and found easy to use and the abilty to output data to a pdf file is good for giving information to my gp. I would like to see options for each type of medication so I could rate each one if useful as some medication is better for one type of migraine than another.
reviews.author: Lynn Barnes

reviews.title: Easy way to keep track of headaches
reviews.comment: Easy way to keep track of headaches. Simple to use. Nice UI. Can add custom medication, triggers, pain locations, and headache types. Automatic database backup. You can also edit past entries, just tap on it in the history list.
reviews.author: Rachel Campbell
